text: Paddington in Peru is a 2024 live-action animated adventure comedy movie directed by Dougal Wilson. ==Overview== Paddington in Peru is the third movie in the Paddington movie series. ==Cast== The movie stars Hugh Bonneville, Emily Mortimer, Julie Walters, Jim Broadbent, Carla Tous, Olivia Colman, Antonio Banderas and Ben Whishaw as the voice of Paddington. ==Release== Paddington in Peru was released in cinemas in the United Kingdom (UK) by StudioCanal on November 8, 2024. The movie received positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2020s sequel movies Category:2024 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Paddington in Peru
